Indian Economy.title: Missing piece in manufacturing, execution needs political hardsell
Indian Economy.summary: With some ground work done for increasing the share of manufacturing in the economy, the government has now once again picked up the thread on stalled reforms by consolidating 29 Central labour laws into four labour codes.

Indian Economy.title: Europe scrambles over US plan to end Ukraine war mostly on Russia’s terms
Indian Economy.summary: The plan, which Ukraine and Europe have said was drafted without their involvement, would require Ukraine to accept conditions that it and its European allies have long called unacceptable and tantamount to capitulation.

Indian Economy.title: Is very low inflation a problem? Not if we take a wide-angle view of the Indian economy
Indian Economy.summary: With inflation unusually low in India, misgivings have arisen in some quarters. It’s true that price stability doesn’t suit everyone. But this must be weighed against its larger economic benefits—which go well beyond the obvious.

Startups & Funding.summary: As climate action stalls and extreme heat accelerates, a once-fringe idea is attracting billions and powerful backers: blocking the sun. Tech billionaires, startups and rogue actors may soon attempt to cool the planet—long before the world agrees on its risks…
